title: Anthropic CEO says AI company 'cannot in good conscience accede' to Pentagon's demands to allow wider use of its tech
description: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei said Thursday the artificial intelligence company “cannot in good conscience accede” to the Pentagon’s demands to allow wider use of its technology.
content:
WASHINGTON — WASHINGTON (AP) — Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei said Thursday the artificial intelligence company “cannot in good conscience accede” to the Pentagon’s demands to allow wider use of its technology.

title: Tumbler Ridge shooter had second ChatGPT account after ban
description: Artificial intelligence firm OpenAI has revealed that the shooter involved in mass killings in Tumbler Ridge, B.C., got around a ban on her problematic use of ChatGPT by having a second account.
content:
Artificial intelligence firm OpenAI has revealed that the shooter involved in mass killings in Tumbler Ridge, B.C., got around a ban on her problematic use of ChatGPT by having a second account.

title: Block Cuts 40% of Its Work Force Because of Its Embrace of A.I.
description: About 4,000 workers will lose their jobs as the payments company does more work with new artificial intelligence tools, its top executive said.
content:
Block, the financial technology company that owns Square, Cash App and Tidal, said on Thursday that it was cutting 40 percent of its work force as it embraced new artificial intelligence tools.
About 4,000 employees are expected to lose their jobs, J... [2315 chars]

title: Modi visits Israeli tech innovation exhibition, invites firms to invest in India
description: JERUSALEM, Feb 26:  Prime Minister Narendra Modi has invited Israeli technology companies to invest in India and partner with Indian youth as he visited an exhibition here showcasing pioneering innovations in areas such as artificial intelligence, healthcare, and agriculture. Modi was accompanied by Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu during the visit to the exhibition on Wednesday. In a social media post on Thursday, Modi said the exhibition showcased “special innovations” from the world of technology. “Got a glimpse of pioneering […]

title: India, Israel sign 27 agreements, upgrade ties to 'Special Strategic Partnership'
description: TEL AVIV, Feb 26 : India and Israel on Thursday exchanged several memorandums of understanding (MoUs) covering artificial intelligence, financial connectivity through UPI, fisheries, culture, geoscience, and the Lothal Maritime Museum, following delegation-level talks between Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu. Sixteen bilateral memoranda of understanding were signed between Israel and India, the office of Israeli Foreign Minister Gideon Sa’ar announced. Within this framework, Sa’ar and Indian Foreign Minister Jaishankar signed “cooperation agreements in the areas […]

content:

title: World order shaken, can't give up on multilateralism: Ex-German chancellor Angela Merkel
description: NEW DELHI, Feb 26: Former German chancellor Angela Merkel on Thursday made a strong case for multilateral cooperation and said in these times of protectionism, giving up on multilaterism was not an option. Delivering the inaugural Dr Manmohan Singh lecture, she referred to the US-led protectionist trade policies and said the world order had been shaken. She also called for regulation on artificial intelligence and new technology including social media, saying all have to come together in doing so as […]
